DOC.brief_summary: The purpose ST Detect study evaluate whether naturally occur spontaneous coronary event exercise induce cardiac ischemia , give rise detectable change intracardiac electrogram ( EGM ) signal patient indicate Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillator ( ICD ) coronary artery disease .
DOC.criteria: Subject indicate ICD implantation AND subject must meet ONE following : Prior acute coronary event Previously underwent Percutaneous Coronary Intervention ( PCI ) stent procedure Multivessel disease Positive stress test complete evidence ischemic heart disease , determine physician , subsequent successful revascularization Subject currently dependent ventricular pace Subject Left Bundle Brunch Block ( LBBB ) and/or wide QRS Subject chronic Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) Subject dementia Subject indicate single chamber device Subject require right side abdominal ICD implant Subject pregnant fertile age without secure birth control Subject New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) class IV refractory heart failure Subject expect survive great 12 month Subject participate confound research study
DOC.keyword: ST segment elevate Myocardial Infarction ( STEMI )
Non-ST Segment elevate Myocardial Infarction ( NSTEMI )
